desc: Inspired by travel, The Lifestyled Home aims to bring you unique global textiles for everyday living. I love sourcing unique textiles that tell a story. I take great pride in creating one-of-a-kind, globally inspired goods for your everyday life. I hope you enjoy my shop!

layout.text: A curated collection of textiles made from global fabrics. Transform your space with one-of-a-kind handcrafted pillows.
